Privacy_Policy.title: Last updated
Privacy_Policy.firstHeading: Welcome to Stylesync (“we,” “our,” or “us”). Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use our clothing app.
Privacy_Policy.secondHeading: When you use our app, we may collect the following types of information:
Privacy_Policy.secondHeading1: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, shipping address, and payment details.
Privacy_Policy.secondHeading2: Account Information: Login credentials and profile preferences.
Privacy_Policy.secondHeading3: Purchase History: Orders placed, returns, and transaction details.
Privacy_Policy.secondHeading4: Device Information: IP address, browser type, and operating system.
Privacy_Policy.secondHeading5: Usage Data: Pages visited, time spent on the app, and interactions.
Privacy_Policy.secondHeading6: Location Data: If you allow location tracking for personalized recommendations.
Privacy_Policy.thirdHeading: How We Use Your Information We use the collected data to:
Privacy_Policy.thirdHeading2: Improve app functionality and user experience.
Privacy_Policy.thirdHeading3: Provide customer support and respond to inquiries.
Privacy_Policy.thirdHeading4: Send promotional offers and personalized recommendations.
Privacy_Policy.fourthHeading2: We do not sell your personal data. However, we may share your information with:
Privacy_Policy.fourthHeading3: Service Providers: Payment processors, delivery partners, and marketing agencies.
Privacy_Policy.fourthHeading4: Legal Authorities: When required by law or to protect our rights.
Privacy_Policy.fourthHeading5: Business Transfers: In case of mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales.
Privacy_Policy.fifthHeading1: We implement security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
Privacy_Policy.sixthHeading2: Access, update, or delete your personal data.
Privacy_Policy.sixthHeading4: Restrict or object to data processing.
Privacy_Policy.seventhHeading1: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.
Privacy_Policy.eighthHeading1: Our app may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices and encourage you to read their policies.
Privacy_Policy.ninthHeading1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted within the app with an updated effective date.
Privacy_Policy.tenthHeading1: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, contact us at .
Privacy_Policy.eleventhHeading: By using our app, you consent to this Privacy Policy
